Rafe's voice: It's not going to be easy to pull this off. I saw their faces.

moving on seems like the only road open. Some lucky ones still have support -- 
an old friend, an old lover to turn to to help them through the tough times. 
Some find themselves more alone than they've ever been. More alone than any
